General.Name: Transition Metals Corp
General.Description: Transition Metals Corp. engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Canada and the United States. It explores for gold, copper, nickel, platinum group metal, and palladium. The company's project portfolio includes the Thunder Bay, Saskatchewan, Abitibi gold, and Sudbury Area projects. Transition Metals Corp. is based in Sudbury, Canada.
